short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves your experience on some revision websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension contains features intended to improve your experience on revision websites, by either removing any blockers or distractions or adding something, to let you focus on what you're really here for!

Currently has features for Physics and Maths Tutor, SaveMyExams, and studocu.

This extension is a work in progress; it will be open-sourced when it is ready.
Issues can be reported to cleaver-exact-chip@duck.com
